relnotes.name: Software Transaction Services
relnotes.purpose: Provide transactional services on top of Symbian OS file system.

defect.title: PREQ1269: STS deletes the existing empty directories on rollback of transaction

relnotes.defect: Issue solved for empty directories on rollback of transaction

defect.title: SMPSAFE MMP file updates for SWI and USIF

relnotes.defect: updated MMP files for SWI and USIF components to declare them SMPSAFE

defect.title: PREQ1269: STS returns -15 error when rollback large number of files

relnotes.defect: STS returns -15 error when rollback large number of files

defect.title: PREQ1269: STS server creating unnecessarry directories.

relnotes.defect: STS server now doesn't create unnecessarry directories

defect.title: PREQ1269: TFileMode enum is used as function paramter type, which is incorrect.

relnotes.defect: Used TUint as function paramter type in the following methods: 1)RStsSession::CreateTemporaryL() 2)RStsSession::CreateNewL() 3)RStsSession::OverwriteL()

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Plugin management and highly desirable features (Phase 2)
deliverystep.preq: 1) Post-manufacture plugin management 2) Complex queries in the SCR 3) Additional smaller requirements and changes and 4) Improved security in the SCR

defect.title: RollBackAllL() should be TRAPed in CStsServer::ConstructL()

relnotes.defect: RollBackAllL() call in CStsServer::ConstructL() has been put in TRAP_IGNORE to ignore any errors returned form the roll-back all procedure and provide smooth STS server startup

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Security and Data Privacy: Universal Software Install Framework (Phase 1)
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the main set of features for the Diran Early Phase. Includes the new components (SCR, SIF and STS), migration of the native installer to use the new components and most reference code. Excludes non-mandatory features and post-production plugin management.
